SEARCH

phaser-client 2.2.0 API

Phaser Client

The Phaser Swing Client is an application for Operators at JLab to control the Phaser server.

Usage

The Phaser Swing Client is distributed as an executable jar file. It was developed as a certified product and Linux binaries can be found in the /cs/certified/apps/phaser file system path. The Phaser Swing Client requires Java 11 or greater and can be launched on Linux with the following command: 


./phaser-client

Configuration

A Java properties file named client.properties is located in the config directory. Users can set the host and port of the Phaser server here. The URL to documentation is also specified here.

Source Code

The Java Phaser Swing Client application is named phaser-client and is stored on GitHub. It can be accessed with the command:


git clone https://github.com/JeffersonLab/phaser-client.git
Packages
Package
Description
org.jlab.phaser
Provides the core Phaser Swing Client classes.
org.jlab.phaser.db
Provides the database access classes.
org.jlab.phaser.exception
Provides the Phaser Swing Client exception classes.
org.jlab.phaser.export
Provides the classes for exporting data.
org.jlab.phaser.model
Provides the Phaser Swing Client object model classes.
org.jlab.phaser.network
Provides the Phaser Swing Client network classes.
org.jlab.phaser.swing
Provides the core Phaser Swing Client Swing GUI classes.
org.jlab.phaser.swing.action
Provides the Phaser Swing Client Swing action classes.
org.jlab.phaser.swing.chooser
Provides the Phaser Swing Client Swing chooser dialog non-generated classes.
org.jlab.phaser.swing.document
Provides the Phaser Swing Client Swing GUI document model classes.
org.jlab.phaser.swing.generated
Provides the classes generated with Netbeans Matisse builder tool.
org.jlab.phaser.swing.generated.dialog
Provides the Phaser Swing Client Swing dialog classes.
org.jlab.phaser.swing.generated.dialog.chooser
Provides the Phaser Swing Client Swing chooser dialog classes.
org.jlab.phaser.swing.table
Provides the Phaser Swing Client Swing GUI table model classes.
org.jlab.phaser.swing.util
Provides the Phaser Swing Client Swing GUI utility classes.
org.jlab.phaser.swing.worker
Provides the Phaser Swing Client Swing worker classes.
